ValidationRule.description: Validates that the account Mailing State/Province is a valid two-character abbreviation if Mailing Country is United States
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT( ISCHANGED( LastActivityDate )), NOT( ISCHANGED( Last_Activity_Type__c )), NOT( ISCHANGED( Last_Meeting_Date_Account__c )), NOT( ISCHANGED( Last_Meeting_Subject_Account__c )), NOT( ISCHANGED( Last_Meeting_Type_Account__c ) )) && NOT(ISBLANK( BillingCity )) && AND ( BillingCountry = "United States", OR ( LEN(BillingState) < 2, NOT ( CONTAINS("AL:AK:AZ:AR:CA:CO:CT:DE:DC:FL:GA:HI:ID:IL:IN:IA:KS:KY:LA:ME:MD:MA:MI:MN:MS:MO:MT:NE:NV:NH:NJ:NM:NY:NC:ND:OH:OK:OR:PA:PR:RI:SC:SD:TN:TX:UT:VT:VI:VA:WA:WV:WI:WY", BillingState) )))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: A valid two-letter state code is required.
